apps.name: Reel Roulette
apps.tagline: Movie search, watchlists, and a movie wheel picker.
apps.description: Search movies fast, build watchlists, and let the roulette wheel pick what to watch next.

apps.name: Shady Encoding
apps.tagline: Utility to encode/decode text with custom keys.
apps.description: Encode/decode text with your own key. Simple, fast, and offline.
